entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Nahanni Butte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:17 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yohin Lake 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -16.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -19.8°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
